sentence: The image is a webpage layout featuring an instructional game for the Nintendo Wii titled "Sesame Street: Cookie¡¯s Counting Carnival."
sentence_cn: 该图片是一个网页布局，展示了任天堂 Wii 的一款教学游戏，名为“芝麻街：饼干的计数嘉年华”。

sentence: - A blue sidebar with a logo at the top showing a cartoon character using a tablet, accompanied by the text "INSTRUCTIONAL GAMES: PLAY TO LEARN."
sentence_cn: - 蓝色侧边栏顶部带有徽标，显示一个使用平板电脑的卡通人物，并附有文字“教学游戏：边玩边学”。

sentence: - Menu options listed: Home, Nintendo, Xbox, PlayStation, and Computer.
sentence_cn: - 列出的菜单选项：主页、任天堂、Xbox、PlayStation 和计算机。

sentence: - A search bar is also visible near the bottom.
sentence_cn: - 底部附近还可以看到搜索栏。

sentence: - A large title reads "Sesame Street: Cookie¡¯s Counting Carnival for the Nintendo Wii."
sentence_cn: - 大标题写着“任天堂 Wii 版《芝麻街：饼干计数嘉年华》”。
words: Sesame Street: Cookie¡¯s Counting Carnival for the Nintendo Wii.

sentence: - Below the title is a game cover image, featuring the recognizable blue character with big eyes, and a yellow character holding balloons.
sentence_cn: - 标题下方是游戏封面图片，其中有一个可识别的大眼睛蓝色角色和一个拿着气球的黄色角色。

sentence: - The game title on the cover says "Sesame Street: Cookie's Counting Carnival The Videogame."
sentence_cn: - 封面上的游戏名称写着“芝麻街：Cookie 的计数嘉年华电子游戏”。
words: Sesame Street: Cookie's Counting Carnival The Videogame.

sentence: - Below the game cover is a brief description, starting with the text: "This game makes math fun at the Counting Carnival!"
sentence_cn: - 游戏封面下方有一个简短的描述，以文字开头：“这个游戏让计数嘉年华中的数学变得有趣！”
words: This game makes math fun at the Counting Carnival!

sentence: The overall design is colorful, reflecting the playful theme of the game.
sentence_cn: 整体设计色彩丰富，体现了游戏俏皮的主题。
